price: 121. Diggah too Nabii Nuuc xaaguy taturet kaskassoowa marah astá tan, kaadu keenik ama xaagu yoobbe marak maggo mari keenik yeemene mara mäkko.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
